description: The platform X is now hiding all users' likes, with few exceptions. It says the change protects users' privacy — but critics say it removes a layer of accountability in the process.
title: X now hides your 'likes' from other users, whether you like it or not

description: To honor the dads in our lives for Father's Day, we're sharing some of the best life advice our listeners ever got from their dads.
title: 8 pieces of life advice from dads

description: A new Hulu documentary looks back on the impact that one 1985 New York Magazine article had on the group of young actors it called the "Brat Pack."
title: In 'Brats,' '80s stars grapple with a label that defined their early careers
